divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at stars threw my telescope when i noticed orange ball thar moved at fast speed from north to south as it got bigger made a sharp right turn to the west got larger went at fast speeds getting larger untill it just vanished this was not a shooting star it was like an orb but moving fast throw out the south west sky
